mapper.select: SELECT RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM( SELECT HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM PCP_HOSPITAL where hname like '%'||#{hname}||'%' ORDER BY HID)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}

SELECT RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM( SELECT HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM PCP_HOSPITAL where gloc like '%'||#{gloc}||'%' ORDER BY HID)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}

SELECT RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM( SELECT HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM PCP_HOSPITAL ORDER BY HID desc)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}

SELECT RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM( SELECT HID, HNAME, ANIMAL, NTIME, HOLIDAY FROM PCP_HOSPITAL ORDER BY HID desc )) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(RSTAR),1) RSTAR FROM (SELECT * FROM PCP_HOSPITAL h, PCP_REVIEW R WHERE H.HID=R.HID AND H.HID= #{hid} )
SELECT HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL, INTRO, IMG, HRINK,X,Y, HSFILE FROM PCP_HOSPITAL where gloc= #{gloc}
SELECT HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL,INTRO, IMG, HRINK, X, Y , HFILE, HSFILE FROM PCP_HOSPITAL WHERE HNAME LIKE '%'|| #{hname}||'%'
SELECT HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL, INTRO, IMG, HRINK,X,Y, hfile, hsfile FROM PCP_HOSPITAL WHERE HID = #{hid}

SELECT H.HID, H.HNAME, H.GLOC, H.LOC, H.TEL, H.HTIME, SUBSTR(H.HTIME, 0, 5) AS STARTTIME, SUBSTR(H.HTIME, 7, 6) AS ENDTIME, H.NTIME, H.HOLIDAY, H.ANIMAL, H.INTRO, H.IMG, H.HRINK, H.X, H.Y, ROUND(AVG(RSTAR),1) AS RSTAR, H.HSFILE FROM (SELECT HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, SUBSTR(HTIME, 0, 5) STARTTIME, SUBSTR(HTIME, 7, 6) ENDTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL, INTRO, IMG, HRINK, X, Y , HSFILE FROM PCP_HOSPITAL ORDER BY HID DESC) H LEFT JOIN PCP_REVIEW R ON H.HID = R.HID GROUP BY H.HID, H.HNAME, H.GLOC, H.LOC, H.TEL, H.HTIME, SUBSTR(H.HTIME, 0, 5), SUBSTR(H.HTIME, 7, 6), H.NTIME, H.HOLIDAY, H.ANIMAL, H.INTRO, H.IMG, H.HRINK, H.X, H.Y , H.HSFILE ORDER BY H.HID
SELECT HID, HNAME, SUBSTR(HTIME, 0,5 ) STARTTIME, SUBSTR(HTIME, 7,6 ) ENDTIME FROM PCP_HOSPITAL WHERE HID= #{hid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PCP_HOSPITAL (HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL, INTRO, HRINK, X, Y,HFILE, HSFILE) VALUES ('H_'||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQU_PCP_HOSPITAL_HID.NEXTVAL,'0000')), #{hname}, #{gloc}, #{loc}, #{tel}, #{htime}, #{ntime}, #{holiday}, #{animal}, #{intro}, #{hrink}, #{x}, #{y}, #{hfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsfile , jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO PCP_HOSPITAL (HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL, INTRO, HRINK, X, Y, HFILE1, HSFILE1, HFILE2, HSFILE2, MID) VALUES ('H_'||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQU_PCP_HOSPITAL_HID.NEXTVAL,'0000')), #{hname}, #{gloc}, #{loc}, #{tel}, #{htime}, #{ntime}, #{holiday}, #{animal}, #{intro}, #{hrink}, #{x}, #{y}, #{hfile1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsfile1 , jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{hfile2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsfile2 , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid})

INSERT INTO PCP_HOSPITAL (HID, HNAME, GLOC, LOC, TEL, HTIME, NTIME, HOLIDAY, ANIMAL, INTRO, HRINK, X, Y, HFILE1, HSFILE1, HFILE2, HSFILE2, MID) VALUES ('H_'||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQU_PCP_HOSPITAL_HID.NEXTVAL,'0000')), #{hname}, #{gloc}, #{loc}, #{tel}, #{htime}, #{ntime}, #{holiday}, #{animal}, #{intro}, #{hrink}, #{x}, #{y}, #{hfile1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsfile1 , jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{hfile2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsfile2 , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid})
